divs: Sighting DetailsAt the time I was looking out my back window when i noticed that there was this tiny black dot in the sky. So i went and got my binochlears and i swear it was a flying saucer! At first i just couldnt believe it. It just hovered and kept on slowly moving. I felt like the cartoon where its eyes pop out of the other end of the binochlears. It was amazing. Eventually it was so far away i couldnt see the black dot anymore so i went inside. it was pretty cool i got it on film.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lake Havasu City
There was one other sighting in Lake Havasu City on or around July 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It was hovering over Lake Havasu.
